attributes.action: Subsidise energy saving lightbulbs to make them cheaper and increase the price of normal, traditional lightbulbs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To increase the usage of energy saving lightbulbs, it would be excellent if the Government could subsidise their production and drive down their cost. And then increase the prices across the board of traditional, energy guzzling lightbulbs which are currently the cheapest.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
